text: Evert (Eef) Brouwers (9 March 1939 – 6 October 2018) was a Dutch journalist and spokesman. He was born in Zwolle, Netherlands. He worked as a news presenter at Regionale Omroep Noord en Oost, AVRO, NOS Studio Sport, NOS and NOS Journaal. From 1977–1983 he was editor in chief of the Northern Dutch regional journal Nieuwsblad van het Noorden. In 1995 he made a career move to become director-general of the Dutch information service Rijksvoorlichtingsdienst, a position he had until January 1, 2004. Brouwers died on 6 October 2018 in The Hague from colorectal cancer at the age 79.NOS- presentator en oud-RVD-chef Eef Brouwers overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Communication, Eef Brouwers * De Volkskrant, personal about Eef Brouwers * Interview with Eef Brouwers Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Dutch journalists Category:Writers from Overijssel
title: Eef Brouwers
